casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

December 11, 2013

[Cite as 12/11/2013 Case Announcements, 2013-Ohio-5403.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In re Howard.

On September 24, 2004, this court found Gregory T. Howard to be a vexatious litigator under S.Ct.Prac.R. 4.03. This court further ordered that Howard was prohibited from continuing or instituting legal proceedings in the court without obtaining leave. On December 9, 2013, Howard presented a motion for leave to file a motion to repeal S.Ct.Prac.R. 4.03.

It is ordered by the court that the motion for leave to file a motion is denied.
